help-file.title: ENLARGE
help-file.content:
Syntax: inn enlarge (for Duergar Dwarf and Shadow Beast) Area of effect: <victim> (for spell) | <self> (for innate) Aggressive: No Cumulative: Yes Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Generic
This spell causes the victim to grow almost twice his size. The victim will become stronger but will lose agility and dexterity.
NOTE: The recipient must consent the caster in order to receive this spell.
